remarks: If an operation value is element of a class for all operands of two classes, then the operation value is an element of the class for specific operands of the two classes.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Dec-2014.)
statement:
ovrspc2v $p |- ( ( ( X e. A /\ Y e. B ) /\ A. x e. A A. y e. B ( x F y ) e. C ) -> ( X F Y ) e. C ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
